original_text: If you go away from the door of the Tent of Meeting you will die. You will die because the Lord's holy oil is on you.’ So Aaron and his sons did as Moses had said.
korean_text: 여호와의 관유가 너희에게 있은즉 너희는 회막 문에 나가지 말라 그리하면 죽음을 면하리라 그들이 모세의 말대로 하니라

sentences.original_text: If you go away from the door of the Tent of Meeting
You will die because the Lord's holy oil is on you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 주의 성유가 너희에게 있으므로 죽을 것이다

sentences.original_text: So Aaron and his sons did
